summary: A test suite for the JoinMarket client that validates wallet functionality, covering mnemonic (BIP39) handling, fee limits, transaction push errors, UTXO set queries, and network compatibility, with helper utilities for wallet setup and transaction execution.
business_intent: To verify the correctness and robustness of wallet operations in the cryptocurrency platform, ensuring secure handling of mnemonics, transaction fees, and network interactions, thereby reducing bugs and protecting user assets.
